## ErrorOccurred.(constructor)

Constructs a new event object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(deviceUid: string, error: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deviceUid | <code>string</code> | a fingeprint reader ID. |
|  error | <code>number</code> | an error code. |
